resources.string: Show us some likes by tapping the \'LIKE\' Button.
TwitterVideo helps you to download Videos and animated Gifs from Tweets to your device.
Copy the tweet url of the tweet containing the video or animated gif. Then paste it into the tweet url box. Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!

Select \'Share Tweet viaâ€¦\' option from the (specific) tweet options. Then select TwitterVideo app from the list of apps (The tweet url is automatically inserted into the tweet url box). Enter the name you want it stored with (optional). Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!

Enable AutoListen using the Switch below the Download Button. From the Twitter app, simply select \'Copy link to tweet\' option from the tweet containing the video or gif. TwitterVideo automatically handles the download of the video or animated gif.
